content:
hl7-fhircast-bot opened Issue #161

## May 2019 Ballot Comment: Sentence is not clear to me

Submitted by Ricardo Quintano Neira on behalf of @bvdh
Chapter/section: Event Catalog
Url: https://fhircast.hl7.org/specification/May2019Ballot/index.html
Type: A-S Clarification

Summary: Sentence is not clear to me

Comment: Sentence is not clear to me

"Hubs MUST send the results of FHIR reads in the context"

What does "FHIR reads" mean?

Existing wording: Hubs MUST send the results of FHIR reads in the context

_This issue was imported by @hl7-fhircast-bot from the consolidated FHIRcast May 2019 ballot spreadsheet._

What does "FHIR reads" mean?

Existing wording: Hubs MUST send the results of FHIR reads in the context

_This issue was imported by @hl7-fhircast-bot from the consolidated FHIRcast May 2019 ballot spreadsheet._

wmaethner commented on Issue #161:

Should be straightforward to clean up this sentence right?

isaacvetter commented on Issue #161:

@bvdh, how about:

Proposed wording: Hubs SHALL send one or more json FHIR resources in the context

The intent is that a hub could perform a RESTful GET / FHIR read on it's FHIR server, shove the resulting json object into the context and then send the notification.

bvdh commented on Issue #161:

@isaacvetter
The FHIR resources and fields are defined in the events. The source of the data could be either the EMR context or the FHIR server.
The data to be included is at least the elements mentioned, potentially more.

Proposed wording:
Hubs SHALL include the elements of the FHIR resources defined in the context part of the event definition. Hubs MAY include other elements of these resources.
The source of these resources is the EMR context or the FHIR server. The hub SHALL return FHIR resources from the EMR context. If the resource is not part of the EMR context, it SHALL read them from the FHIR server.

wmaethner commented on Issue #161:

## :landline: II Working Group Vote (6-18-2019)
Block vote

@isaacvetter moved the following disposition, seconded by Ricardo Quintano Neira

Disposition: Persuasive
Disposition Comment: Will fix as described in the issue comments or by the commenter

:+1: For: 10
:expressionless: Abstain: 2
:-1: Against: 0

:tada: The motion passed! :tada:
